General.Name: PT Harapan Duta Pertiwi Tbk
General.Description: PT Harapan Duta Pertiwi Tbk manufactures body parts for trucks and commercial vehicles in Indonesia. It offers wing box, self-loader, towing, Hi-Blow tank, flat deck, logging, full box, chemical tank, fuel tank, asphalt tank, trailer, water gallon, dump, cargo, and crane trucks; concrete mixers; and tank, gas, and fuel trucks to carry liquids or gases. The company also provides after-sales services. PT Harapan Duta Pertiwi Tbk was founded in 2005 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Kawasan Industri Kencana Alam, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15710
